Package io.github.ai4ci.functions

Interface Distribution

All Known Subinterfaces:
EmpiricalDistribution, ResampledDistribution, SimpleDistribution, SimpleDistribution.BetaDistribution, SimpleDistribution.BinomialDistribution, SimpleDistribution.GammaDistribution, SimpleDistribution.LogitNormalDistribution, SimpleDistribution.LogNormalDistribution, SimpleDistribution.NegBinomialDistribution, SimpleDistribution.NormalDistribution, SimpleDistribution.PointDistribution, SimpleDistribution.PoissonDistribution, SimpleDistribution.UniformDistribution, SimpleDistribution.UnimodalBetaDistribution
public interface Distribution
Interface for probability distributions used in the modeling framework.

Supports a wide variety of statistical distributions including binomial, Poisson, negative binomial, gamma, normal, log-normal, beta, uniform, and empirical distributions. Provides sampling capabilities and statistical transformations.
